front.title: Sleep node control mechanism for Constrained networks

abstract.t: This document describes the mechanism of sleep mode control. The router which manages a network can control IPv6 sleepy nodes and deliver the packets from/to exterior networks. The IPv6 router can keep the IPv6 sleepy node as sleep state and handle the packets from/ to the IPv6 sleepy nodes. Also, this document describes the mechanism of sleep mode control using synchronization information.
